    • Method Detail

      • bindElaboratorTo

        public static void bindElaboratorTo(java.lang.String listName,
                    Elaborator elab,
                    ServletRequest request)
        Stores the declaration information of an rhnSet so as to be used by the list tag while rendering a set.
        Parameters:
        listName - name of list
        elab - the elaboratable object to bind to bind
        request - current HttpServletRequest

      • lookupElaboratorFor

        public static Elaborator lookupElaboratorFor(java.lang.String listName,
                             ServletRequest request)
        Returns an Elaborator associated to this list if it was previously bound.
        Parameters:
        listName - the name of the list to who holds the set. Note: this must be a Unique Name .. See bindElaboratorTo method for more info.
        request - the servlet request object
        Returns:
        returns the elaborator associated to the list.

      • generateUniqueName

        public static java.lang.String generateUniqueName(java.lang.String name)
        Generates the unique name for a list
        Parameters:
        name - list name
        Returns:
        "uniquified" name
